Rulings.Cat:
● If you activate 'Gravity Bind' when a LV 4 or higher monster attacks, the attack stops.
● When you attack with a LV 4 or higher monster and your opponent activates 'Mirror Force', if you chain 'Gravity Bind' the attack of your monster stops but 'Mirror Force' still resolves and destroys your Attack Position monsters.
